Past Tense Usage - Past time expressions

sections.heading: Essential Time Words
sections.content:
Japanese has specific words for different time references. These words help clarify when actions occur.

今 - now 昨日 - yesterday 明日 - tomorrow

children.heading: 今 (ima) - Now
children.content: 今、勉強している "I'm studying now" 今は忙しい "I'm busy now" 今すぐ行く "I'll go right now"

children.heading: 現在 (genzai) - Present/Currently
children.content:
More formal:

現在、東京に住んでいます "I currently live in Tokyo" 現在の状況 "the current situation"

children.heading: 今日 (kyou) - Today
children.content: 今日は暑い "It's hot today" 今日何をしますか？ "What will you do today?" 今日は月曜日です "Today is Monday"

children.heading: 昨日 (kinou) - Yesterday
children.content: 昨日映画を見た "I watched a movie yesterday" 昨日は雨だった "It was rainy yesterday" 昨日の夜 "last night"

children.heading: 一昨日 (ototoi) - Day before yesterday
children.content: 一昨日友達に会った "I met a friend the day before yesterday" 一昨日は寒かった "It was cold the day before yesterday"

children.heading: さっき (sakki) - Just now/A moment ago
children.content: さっき食べた "I ate just now" さっき彼が来た "He came a moment ago"

children.heading: 先ほど (sakihodo) - A while ago (polite)
children.content: 先ほどお電話しました "I called a while ago" 先ほどはありがとうございました "Thank you for earlier"

children.heading: 明日 (ashita/asu) - Tomorrow
children.content: 明日東京に行く "I'll go to Tokyo tomorrow" 明日は休みです "Tomorrow is a day off" 明日の朝 "tomorrow morning"

children.heading: 明後日 (asatte) - Day after tomorrow
children.content: 明後日テストがある "There's a test the day after tomorrow" 明後日会いましょう "Let's meet the day after tomorrow"

children.heading: 後で (atode) - Later
children.content: 後で電話します "I'll call later" 後でやる "I'll do it later"

children.heading: すぐ (sugu) - Soon/Right away
children.content: すぐ行きます "I'll go right away" すぐ始まる "It will start soon"

children.heading: もうすぐ (mousugu) - Soon/Before long
children.content: もうすぐ着く "I'll arrive soon" もうすぐ春だ "It will be spring soon"

children.heading: This Week/Month/Year
children.content: 今週 (konshuu) - this week 今月 (kongetsu) - this month 今年 (kotoshi) - this year 今週は忙しい "I'm busy this week" 今月の予定 "this month's schedule"

children.heading: Last Week/Month/Year
children.content: 先週 (senshuu) - last week 先月 (sengetsu) - last month 去年 (kyonen) - last year 先週映画を見た "I watched a movie last week" 去年日本に行った "I went to Japan last year"

children.heading: Next Week/Month/Year
children.content: 来週 (raishuu) - next week 来月 (raigetsu) - next month 来年 (rainen) - next year 来週テストがある "There's a test next week" 来年結婚します "I'll get married next year"

children.heading: Week/Month/Year After Next
children.content: 再来週 (saraishuu) - week after next 再来月 (saraigetsu) - month after next 再来年 (sarainen) - year after next 再来週会いましょう "Let's meet the week after next"

children.heading: 朝 (asa) - Morning
children.content: 今朝 (kesa) - this morning 明日の朝 (ashita no asa) - tomorrow morning 毎朝 (maiasa) - every morning 今朝パンを食べた "I ate bread this morning"

children.heading: 昼 (hiru) - Daytime/Noon
children.content: お昼 (ohiru) - lunch time 昼ごはん (hirugohan) - lunch 毎日昼に (mainichi hiru ni) - every day at noon

children.heading: 夕方 (yuugata) - Evening
children.content: 夕方会いましょう "Let's meet in the evening" 夕方は涼しい "It's cool in the evening"

children.heading: 晩/夜 (ban/yoru) - Night
children.content: 今晩 (konban) - tonight 昨晩 (sakuban) - last night 毎晩 (maiban) - every night 今晩映画を見る "I'll watch a movie tonight" 昨晩遅く寝た "I went to bed late last night"

children.heading: Time + 前 (mae)
children.content: 3日前 - 3 days ago 1週間前 - 1 week ago 2年前 - 2 years ago 5分前 - 5 minutes ago 3日前に会った "I met (them) 3 days ago" 2年前に日本に来た "I came to Japan 2 years ago"

sections.heading: Since/From (〜から)
sections.content: 昨日から - since yesterday 先週から - since last week 今朝から - since this morning 昨日から雨が降っている "It's been raining since yesterday" 先週から忙しい "I've been busy since last week"

children.heading: いつも (itsumo) - Always
children.content: いつも早く起きる "I always wake up early" いつもここで勉強します "I always study here"

children.heading: 普段 (fudan) - Usually/Normally
children.content: 普段は7時に起きる "I usually wake up at 7 o'clock" 普段何を食べますか？ "What do you usually eat?"

children.heading: 時々 (tokidoki) - Sometimes
children.content: 時々映画を見る "I sometimes watch movies" 時々ここに来ます "I sometimes come here"

children.heading: Specific Times
children.content: 朝早く (asa hayaku) - early morning 昼間 (hiruma) - daytime 夜遅く (yoru osoku) - late at night 真夜中 (mayonaka) - midnight 朝早く起きた "I woke up early in the morning" 真夜中に帰った "I went home at midnight"

children.heading: Four Seasons
children.content: 春 (haru) - spring 夏 (natsu) - summer 秋 (aki) - autumn/fall 冬 (fuyu) - winter 今年の春 - this spring 去年の夏 - last summer 来年の秋 - next autumn

children.heading: Basic Days
children.content: 月曜日 (getsuyoubi) - Monday 火曜日 (kayoubi) - Tuesday 水曜日 (suiyoubi) - Wednesday 木曜日 (mokuyoubi) - Thursday 金曜日 (kinyoubi) - Friday 土曜日 (doyoubi) - Saturday 日曜日 (nichiyoubi) - Sunday 今日は月曜日です "Today is Monday" 月曜日に会いましょう "Let's meet on Monday"

children.heading: Every (毎〜)
children.content: 毎日 (mainichi) - every day 毎週 (maishuu) - every week 毎月 (maitsuki) - every month 毎年 (maitoshi) - every year 毎朝 (maiasa) - every morning 毎晩 (maiban) - every night 毎日運動する "I exercise every day" 毎週映画を見ます "I watch movies every week"

children.heading: All Day/Night
children.content: 一日中 (ichinichijuu) - all day 一晩中 (hitoban juu) - all night 朝から晩まで (asa kara ban made) - from morning till night 一日中勉強した "I studied all day"

children.heading: Example 1: Making Plans
children.content: A: いつ会いますか？ "When shall we meet?" B: 明日はどうですか？ "How about tomorrow?" A: いいですね。何時がいいですか？ "That's good. What time is good?" B: 午後3時はどうですか？ "How about 3 PM?"

children.heading: Example 2: Talking About Past
children.content: A: 昨日何をしましたか？ "What did you do yesterday?" B: 映画を見ました "I watched a movie" A: 面白かったですか？ "Was it interesting?" B: はい、とても面白かったです "Yes, it was very interesting"

children.heading: Example 3: Current Activity
children.content: A: 今何をしていますか？ "What are you doing now?" B: 宿題をしています "I'm doing homework" A: 後で遊びませんか？ "Won't you play later?" B: いいですよ "Sure"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong pronunciation
children.content: 明日: ashita (common) or asu (also correct) Not: myounichi ❌

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing similar words
children.content: 今日 (kyou) - today 昨日 (kinou) - yesterday 明日 (ashita) - tomorrow Don't confuse these!

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using wrong particles
children.content: Wrong: 昨日で行った ❌ Right: 昨日行った ✓ "I went yesterday" Note: Time words don't usually need に

children.heading: Present
children.content: 今勉強している "I'm studying now" 今日は暑いです "It's hot today" 今週は忙しい "I'm busy this week"

children.heading: Past
children.content: 昨日映画を見た "I watched a movie yesterday" 先週東京に行きました "I went to Tokyo last week" 3日前に会った "I met (them) 3 days ago"

children.heading: Future
children.content: 明日学校に行く "I'll go to school tomorrow" 来週テストがあります "There will be a test next week" 後で電話します "I'll call later"

children.heading: Habitual
children.content: 毎日運動する "I exercise every day" いつも早く起きます "I always wake up early" 時々ここに来る "I sometimes come here"
